scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, his body showing wounds and blood. To the left stands the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle, her face etched with sorrow. To the right is Saint John the Evangelist, his hands clasped in prayer, wearing a red cloak over a purple tunic. The background features a stylized landscape with rocky outcrops and distant buildings, suggesting a setting outside a city. The overall composition conveys the solemnity and tragedy of the event.
